snippet: Travelers with no time to buy guides are the people Fodor’s had in mind when it developed a mobile version of Travel Phrases, with 400 essential phrases for 22 languages. The company began selling individual language apps for $1.99 on iTunes.

headline.main: A Phrasebook That Comes Along on Your Phone
